turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to order some coffee for pickup.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, let's get the order started. where do you wanna order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm from the Starbucks on Monica Drive in Chicago.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. and what would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a cherry mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sorry, cherry mocha isn't on the menu for starbucks. did you want to pick out another drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sure, 1 second.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Give a cinnamon shortbread latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want that iced or hot?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and what size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: tall.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. so you want 1 tall hot cinnamon shortbread latte from starbucks in chicago.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want almond milk in it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, let me modify it to almond milk in your order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's all I needed.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $4.50 is the total. should i submit the order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yep, go ahead and do it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, i've submitted the order, it'll be ready for pick up in 10 minutes. the receipt has been sent to you as well, via text.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's all I wanted.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: awesome, enjoy the drink.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks.
